value.title: Future Proof Your Business With AI In Products And Services
value.excerpt: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is one of the most potent technologies businesses have ever had access to. In order to thrive and meet the customer expectations of the future, businesses must consider integrating AI into their products and services.

value.title: 2022 DesignCon Shows Evolution Of Electronic Chip Communication And Memory
value.excerpt: DesignCon covered electronic design and integration, including photonic in chip communication. Rambus presented talks discussing the use of various xDDR and HBM memories for various applications including edge AI training,

value.title: Chipotle tests tortilla chip-making robots to combat labor shortage
value.excerpt: Chippy, the robot named and designed by Miso Robotics, will be able to cook and season Chipotle’s popular chips.

value.title: AI pioneer suggests trickle-down approach to machine learning
value.excerpt: In 2015, modern AI trailblazer Andrew Ng's recipe for success was to go big on neural networks, data, and monolithic systems. Now that recipe has created a problem: the technology is dominated by only a few rich companies with the money and headcount to build such immense systems.

value.title: Inside Intel’s Strategy to Compete With Nvidia in the AI-Chip Market
value.excerpt: Nvidia has dominated the growing artificial-intelligence business. Intel wants to change that.

value.title: 2 Top AI Stocks Ready for A Bull Run
value.excerpt: AI will increasingly rely on powerful 7-nanometer (nm) and 5nm chips, and companies will likely be making the jump in the next few years to 3nm and 2nm chips that deliver even better performance and open the door for even more advanced artificial-intelligence and machine-learning applications.

value.title: Benchmark test of AI's performance, MLPerf, continues to gain adherents
value.excerpt: Computer makers Asus and H3C join Nvidia and Qualcomm in AI industry bake-off for computer speed and efficiency.

value.title: The Sounds Of The AI Benchmark War: Crickets
value.excerpt: NVIDIA once again dominated a near-empty field of AI competitors in MLPerf Inference V2.0. Let’s explore why other chip companies don’t want to play. Industry standard benchmarks have been an important feature of the IT landscape for decades,

value.title: IBM Puts AI On A Chip To Improve Fraud Detection In Real-Time Payments
value.excerpt: IBM has launched a new generation mainframe with artificial intelligence built into the chip to provide financial firms such as banks and credit card companies with the ability to conduct fraud analysis of 100% of their transaction in real-time.

value.title: Lanner Electronics and MOV.AI to speed AMR development with an integrated computing and software platform
value.excerpt: Lanner Electronics and MOV.AI are collaborating to provide autonomous mobile robot (AMR) manufacturers with an integrated computing and software platform for optimized performance and faster AMR development and deployment.

value.title: BrainChip, SiFive partner to bring AI and ML to edge computing
value.excerpt: The integration of BrainChip's Akida technology and SiFive's multi-core capable RISC-V processors is expected to provide an efficient solution for integrated edge AI computing.

value.title: IBM launches AI-accelerated, ‘quantum-safe’ mainframe
value.excerpt: IBM’s z16 mainframe is designed for hybrid cloud environments, features an on-chip AI accelerator and what the company calls the industry’s first quantum-safe system.

value.title: IBM releases new server that uses AI chip developed in Albany
value.excerpt: ALBANY - IBM has released its newest mainframe computer server - the z16 - that uses artificial intelligence and chips developed in Albany that protect businesses and consumers from hackers even before a transaction goes through.

value.title: Lanner, MOV.AI partner to expedite mobile robot development
value.excerpt: Collaborative solution to provide both the machine vision computing and software platform developers need to build and deploy mobile robots.

value.title: Microsoft taps AI to make you look your best in video meetings
value.excerpt: Microsoft is applying artificial intelligence to meetings, with a host of new AI-driven technologies from Eye Contact, automatic framing, plus improved background blur and echo cancellation.

value.title: The Intel Arc GPU Lineup May Be A Serious Competitor
value.excerpt: The Intel Arc GPU series is coming out soon to laptops and desktops. What do they have to offer compared to the current competition?

value.title: Intel Shows Off its First Ever Desktop Gaming GPU
value.excerpt: Intel debuted its first Arc GPUs today for laptops, and also gave us a first look at the desktop Arc GPUs via an official teaser image. Perhaps

value.title: Intel Arc-A GPU offers full AV1 hardware acceleration
value.excerpt: Introduced as Intel’s solution for both gamers and content creators, the new Arc-A graphic products are, the company says, “more than another piece of hardware in your PC” they are “your portal to play and create” on PC.

value.title: Intel confirms acquisition of Granulate, reportedly for up to $650M, bringing AI-based workload optimization into its fold
value.excerpt: Last year, when we wrote about new investment for Israeli startup Granulate — which applies AI to high-priority computing workloads to optimize how they travel across a customers’ cloud and on-premises networks — we noted that the network management space was going through some

value.title: Synopsys Launches Disruptive Cloud-Based SaaS Solution To Accelerate And Democratize Chip Design
value.excerpt: In a move that could have broad-reaching implications for chip design and the Electronic Design Automation industry, Synopsys has launched a new cloud-based SaaS solution, dubbed Synopsys Cloud, which makes its cutting-edge design a tools available to a diverse spectrum of potential customers.

value.title: Opinion: Intel spices up PC market with Arc GPU launch
value.excerpt: Intel officially announced today the Arc A series, which is targeted at laptops. A version of Arc for desktops has been promised for the second quarter,

value.title: Chip Design Moves To The Cloud With Synopsys And Microsoft Azure
value.excerpt: The two companies have collaborated to enable engineers to design chips using cloud resources and dynamic licensing. Digital chips are the new lifeblood for nearly every human endeavor and currency for innovation. But design a chip is a very expensive ...

value.title: Intel teases first Arc A-series desktop GPU ahead of summer launch
value.excerpt: Intel says it will release its first Arc A-series desktop GPU this summer, and has offered a brief peek at the card itself..

value.title: Intel launches Arc graphics chips for gaming laptops
value.excerpt: It feels like ages ago when Intel first started working on its discrete graphics chips, which will ship soon under the Intel Arc brand name.

value.title: Intel ARC Invades The Dedicated GPU Market With Truly Exciting Features
value.excerpt: Everything you need to know about Intel Arc A-Series graphics. Plus: How Team Blue is doing things differently than AMD and Nvidia, while still catering to both gamers and content creators.

value.title: IAR Systems enables powerful AI/ML applications based on Alif Semiconductor's microcontrollers and fusion processors
value.excerpt: The partnership between IAR Systems and Alif Semiconductor accelerates innovation in the embedded space through strong artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning (ML) capabilities UPPSALA, Sweden,

value.title: "Global Recognition for Unique AI Human Technology" DeepBrain AI participates 'NVIDIA GTC 2022', Presenting AI Human Technology and Research Outcome
value.excerpt: DeepBrain AI CTO Kyung-Soo Chae presents time-reducing, lip sync video synthesis technology. Participates in 'Digital Human and Interactive AI'

value.title: ISG Acquires AI Platform Solution Agreemint
value.excerpt: Information Services Group (Nasdaq: III), a leading global technology research and advisory firm, said today it has acquired automated contracting solution Agreemint from its foun

value.title: Tesla’s head of AI is on sabbatical and people are worried
value.excerpt: Elon Musk announced that Tesla’s head of AI, Andrej Karpathy, is on a four-month sabbatical, and people are worried since other Tesla execs have left after going on sabbatical. It comes as Tesla expands its Full Self-Driving (FSD) Beta to Canada.

value.title: AI Chip Company Syntiant Raises $55 Million to Accelerate Growth
value.excerpt: Syntiant Corp., a provider of deep learning solutions making edge AI a reality for always-on voice, sensor, audio and image applications, today
